repos_data.description: The AWS Cloud Development Kit is a framework for defining cloud infrastructure in code
DevOps Happiness: for AI Agents & Humans. Deploy apps and infra to any cloud, in minutes. Fast, simple, cloud-native ðŸš€

A lightweight service that enables AI assistants to execute AWS CLI commands (in safe containerized environment) through the Model Context Protocol (MCP). Bridges Claude, Cursor, and other MCP-aware AI tools with AWS CLI for enhanced cloud infrastructure management.
